General.Name: VIB Vermögen AG
General.Description: VIB Vermögen AG, a real estate holding company, develops, buys, holds, rents, and manages commercial real estate properties in Germany. The company's real estate portfolio includes logistics and light industry properties, industrial real estate, shopping centers, and specialist retail parks, as well as commercial and service centers. It also manages properties of institutional investors. The company was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Neuburg an der Donau, Germany.
General.Address: Tilly-Park 1, Neuburg an der Donau, Germany, 86633
